title: Ownership Structure of Bath & Body Works Inc

content.text: The major shareholders of Bath & Body Works Inc are institutional investors and insiders. These shareholders hold significant stakes in the company and play a crucial role in its ownership structure.
Some of the major institutional investors in Bath & Body Works Inc include:

Vanguard Group Inc. is one of the largest institutional investors in Bath & Body Works Inc, holding a significant stake in the company. As of the latest available data, Vanguard Group Inc. owns approximately X% of the company's outstanding shares.
BlackRock, Inc. is another major institutional investor in Bath & Body Works Inc. It holds a substantial stake in the company, with ownership of around X% of the outstanding shares.
State Street Corporation is also a significant institutional investor in Bath & Body Works Inc. It owns approximately X% of the company's outstanding shares.
Insiders, including executives, directors, and employees of Bath & Body Works Inc, also hold a notable portion of the company's shares.

Leslie H. Wexner is the founder and former CEO of Bath & Body Works Inc. He is a major insider shareholder, and as of the latest available data, he owns approximately X% of the company's outstanding shares.
Various other insiders, including executives and board members, hold a significant number of shares in Bath & Body Works Inc, collectively representing around X% of the company's outstanding shares.

news.headline: Bath & Body Works to Present at the Evercore ISI Consumer and Retail Conference
news.summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, May 28, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bath & Body Works, Inc. (NYSE: BBWI) announced today that Eva Boratto, chief financial officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the Evercore ISI Consumer & Retail Conference on Tuesday, June 11, 2024, at 11:00 a.m. EDT. news.headline: Bath & Body Works to Report First Quarter Results on June 4, 2024
news.summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, May 21, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bath & Body Works, Inc. (NYSE: BBWI) announced today that it plans to report its first quarter 2024 financial results before market open on Tuesday, June 4, 2024. In conjunction with this report, the company will host a conference call at 9:00 a.m. EDT during which Gina Boswell, chief executive officer, Eva Boratto, chief financial officer, and Julie Rosen, president, retail, will provide a business update and discuss the company's results.
